question: Show me customers who churned in the last 30 days
query: SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.email, s.plan_name, s.end_date FROM customers c JOIN subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.status = 'churned' AND s.end_date >= date('now', '-30 days') ORDER BY s.end_date DESC
reasoning: Joins customers with churned subscriptions and filters by end_date within last 30 days
